Module project
Package project.network

Class HTTPBuilder

java.lang.Object
project.network.HTTPBuilder
public class HTTPBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
This class builds HTTP Requests to a Database Server with GET, POST and DELETE Methods.

  • Method Details

    • playerToJSON

      private org.json.JSONObject playerToJSON​(Player player)
      Turn a player into a JSONObject. This avoids problems with failed LocalDateTime JSON Parsing.
      Parameters:
      player - who ended the game
      Returns:
      JSONObject

    • JSONtoPlayer

      public java.util.List<Player> JSONtoPlayer​(java.net.http.HttpResponse<java.lang.String> jsonList) throws java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      jsonList - Response of Get-Request, which is a list of players
      Returns:
      jsonList as ArrayList with Player Objects
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if Player doesnt exist.

    • basicAuth

      private java.lang.String basicAuth​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Method to encrypt data of authorization header.
      Parameters:
      username - of login
      password - of login
      Returns:
      auth data encrypted

    • httpGET

      public java.net.http.HttpResponse<java.lang.String> httpGET()
      Send GET Method Request to Server to retrieve High Score of the database. Duration has a maximum of 10 Seconds. The Server is most probably unavailable if failed.

    • httpPOST

      public java.net.http.HttpResponse<java.lang.String> httpPOST​(Player player)
      Send POST Method Request to Server to save your score to the high score list. Duration has a maximum of 10 Seconds. The Server is most probably unavailable if failed.
      Parameters:
      player - who has finished the game successfully.

    • httpDELETE

      public java.net.http.HttpResponse<java.lang.String> httpDELETE​(int id)
      This method isn't being used as of now, but it completes the REST behavior. Send DELETE Method Request to Server to delete a specific PRIMARY KEY id in the database. Duration has a maximum of 10 Seconds. The Server is most probably unavailable if failed.
      Parameters:
      id - of player PK in the database.
